name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (miznerco)
description:
3D Platformer Tutorial

Proposed Modifications:

1. Add new levels and change level 1 to better fit a new game title 

2. change level layout in a very unique way 

3. utilize the pick ups such as doors, keys, and power ups to give my level flavor 

4. change UI color on menus, pause buttons, etc to give it a personal feel 

5. change enemies health and color to allow more of a challenge 

6? possibly try to add my own music
